misc: Operates the Hector organization's digital media properties
Gotten increasingly close to winning the Hector Trophée but hasn't quite gotten it done yet
biography: Lasse is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, known for his keen eye for detail and dedication to the sport. Representing Tapiola Golf, Lasse is a formidable competitor, though the coveted Hector Trophée has remained just out of reach despite his increasingly strong performances over the years.

Beyond the course, Lasse is the man behind the scenes, operating the Hector organization's digital media properties. His contributions ensure that fans and players alike remain connected and informed.
Hector Trophée 2025 will mark Lasse's ninth appearance in the tournament. While victory has eluded him thus far, his determination and skill make him one to watch in the upcoming competition.
